title: Automakers Say They Resolved the Right-to-Repair Fight. Critics Aren’t Ready to Make Peace
description: An auto industry pact claims to end the controversy over car data that has embroiled repair shops, parts manufacturers, and car owners. But many doubts remain.

title: Instagram Posts About a 17th-Century King Are Getting People Arrested
description: Right-wing groups in India are policing social media and reporting minorities for allegedly offending their religion.

title: Startups Under Fire: The Remarkable Resilience of Ukraine’s Tech Sector
description: Ukraine’s technology industry grew in 2022, adapting to do more than survive under constant disruption.
